title: I got a problem
body:
So... i have a problem.. when i log in with my account works soooooooooooooooooo hard. After i'm connected the client don't show me the home page, it is just black. When i connect with my another account (level 1, just created it) it works very well.. but after i enter into a lobby i press ''find match'' and nothing happen..don't put me in q. After a few second after i press the button, i can press it again.. and still nothing happen.
HELP ME PLS. I DON'T KNOW WHAT I SHOULD DO :((
P.S. I play on EUNE server.

replies.body: I would probably start with double checking your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure everything is configured in the best way for League to run. There could also be some setting within your firewall that is blocking League from connecting, so make sure to check up on that as well.
